arStrings.szText: {c_important}Stone Burst's{/c} final explosion damage is increased by {c_number}[SF_21*100|%x|]{/c} on enemies in the initial area.
While Channeling {c_important}Stone Burst{/c} and for {c_number}[SF_26]{/c} seconds afterwards, you gain {c_number}[SF_25 * 100|%+|]{/c} Attack Speed.
{c_important}Stone Burst{/c} costs {c_number}[SF_19 * 100|%x|]{/c} more Spirit, and its final explosion deals {c_number}[SF_27 * 100|%x|]{/c} more damage.
